testcase.name: Add New Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And click on customers Menu item............................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then user can view Add new customer page....................................passed When user enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then user can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When user click on Logout link..............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
